questions.question: この　映画（＿）　おもしろいですね。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～は - topic marker

おもしろい - interesting/funny

映画（えいが） - movie

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「このえいがはおもしろい」 means "This movie is interesting."

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker, but topic is preferred here
  • に - indirect target, not suitable here
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is は.

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker, but topic is preferred here
  • に - indirect target, not suitable here

questions.question: 田中さん（＿）　電話を　かけました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に 電話をかける - to call someone

田中さん - Tanaka-san (person)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「田中さんに電話をかけました」 means "I called Mr./Ms. Tanaka."

  • を - marks the object, but person is not object here
  • が - subject marker
  • と - with
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • を - marks the object, but person is not object here
  • が - subject marker
  • と - with

questions.question: うちの　近く（＿）　大きい　こうえんが　あります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に あります - something exists at a place

近く - nearby/near

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「近くにあります」 means "There is (something) near (somewhere)."

  • で - action location, but あります is not an action
  • を - object marker
  • の - possession or connection
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • で - action location, but あります is not an action
  • を - object marker
  • の - possession or connection
